title: Pesu sending incorrect esa results
content:
I got this , im in 5th sem my course codes starts from ue21csxxx , this is someone else's results. I know 3 ppl who got this.
I got fucking scared coz of the f grade shitğŸ’€ğŸ’€ğŸ’€ğŸ’€ğŸ’€

comments.body: Bro I can understand you freaking out, but is it legit, and I think jan 5 they will declare the results

Ah yes the classic someone else's results being shown for everyone. Nice to know that bugs that existed way back in 2018 are still prevalent today ğŸ’€

But yeah, if it's the same grades showing for everyone then it's a bug at their end. It usually resolves on its own in sometime. 

So don't worry, in all likelihood it isn't your result sheet (unless you're the poor soul who actually got that, in which case F my brother)
They are giving you spoilers for the next sem ğŸ’€
You gave me a fright ğŸ˜­. I thought the results came untill i saw sixth semester lol
What do u think today is?
Results in the calendar of events aug-dec 2023, it was written
That's what I am also telling,
The craziest part is my courses are dbms se bd da mi respectively , i got so scared seeing the f grade, i thought it was mi .later i realised that the whole thing is glitched and fked up
Do we get Capstone grade after 6th sem or later ?

Capstone comprises 3 phases, spread across 6th, 7th and 8th sem. Each phase has 2, 6, and 2 credits respectively (as far as I remember) and therefore each also gets an independent grade at the end of the respective sem.
